db:abstract.db:para: Abstract model mapper class for candlestick series.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Model mappers allow the use of a QAbstractItemModel-derived model as a data source for a chart series, creating a connection between a QCandlestickSeries and the model object. A model mapper maintains an equal size across all QCandlestickSets.

db:note.db:para: The model used must support adding and removing rows/columns and modifying the data of the cells.

db:section.db:title: model : QAbstractItemModel*
db:section.db:para: Defines the model that is used by the mapper.

db:section.db:title: series : QCandlestickSeries*
db:section.db:para: Defines the QCandlestickSeries object that is used by the mapper.

db:note.db:para: All data in the series is discarded when it is set to the mapper. When a new series is specified, the old series is disconnected (preserving its data).

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QCandlestickModelMapper::QCandlestickModelMapper(QObject *parent = nullptr)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a model mapper object as a child of parent.

db:section.db:title: [protected] int QCandlestickModelMapper::close() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the row/column of the model that contains the close values of the sets in the series. Default value is -1 (invalid mapping).

db:section.db:title: [protected] int QCandlestickModelMapper::firstSetSection() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the section of the model that is used as the data source for the first candlestick set. Default value is -1 (invalid mapping).

db:section.db:title: [protected] int QCandlestickModelMapper::high() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the row/column of the model that contains the high values of the sets in the series. Default value is -1 (invalid mapping).

db:section.db:title: [protected] int QCandlestickModelMapper::lastSetSection() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the section of the model that is used as the data source for the last candlestick set. Default value is -1 (invalid mapping).

db:section.db:title: [protected] int QCandlestickModelMapper::low() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the row/column of the model that contains the low values of the sets in the series. Default value is -1 (invalid mapping).

db:section.db:title: void QCandlestickModelMapper::modelReplaced()
db:section.db:para: Emitted when the model, to which the mapper is connected, has changed.

db:section.db:title: [protected] int QCandlestickModelMapper::open() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the row/column of the model that contains the open values of the sets in the series. Default value is -1 (invalid mapping).

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] Qt::Orientation QCandlestickModelMapper::orientation() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the orientation that is used when QCandlestickModelMapper accesses the model. This determines whether the consecutive values of the set are read from rows (Qt::Horizontal) or from columns (Qt::Vertical).

db:section.db:title: void QCandlestickModelMapper::seriesReplaced()
db:section.db:para: Emitted when the series to which mapper is connected to has changed.

db:section.db:title: [protected] void QCandlestickModelMapper::setClose(int close)
db:section.db:para: Sets the row/column of the model that contains the close values of the sets in the series. Default value is -1 (invalid mapping).

db:section.db:title: [protected] void QCandlestickModelMapper::setFirstSetSection(int firstSetSection)
db:section.db:para: Sets the section of the model that is used as the data source for the first candlestick set. Parameter firstSetSection specifies the section of the model. Default value is -1.

db:section.db:title: [protected] void QCandlestickModelMapper::setHigh(int high)
db:section.db:para: Sets the row/column of the model that contains the high values of the sets in the series. Default value is -1 (invalid mapping).

db:section.db:title: [protected] void QCandlestickModelMapper::setLastSetSection(int lastSetSection)
db:section.db:para: Sets the section of the model that is used as the data source for the last candlestick set. Parameter lastSetSection specifies the section of the model. Default value is -1.

db:section.db:title: [protected] void QCandlestickModelMapper::setLow(int low)
db:section.db:para: Sets the row/column of the model that contains the low values of the sets in the series. Default value is -1 (invalid mapping).

db:section.db:title: [protected] void QCandlestickModelMapper::setOpen(int open)
db:section.db:para: Sets the row/column of the model that contains the open values of the sets in the series. Default value is -1 (invalid mapping).

db:section.db:title: [protected] void QCandlestickModelMapper::setTimestamp(int timestamp)
db:section.db:para: Sets the row/column of the model that contains the timestamp values of the sets in the series. Default value is -1 (invalid mapping).

db:section.db:title: [protected] int QCandlestickModelMapper::timestamp() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the row/column of the model that contains the timestamp values of the sets in the series. Default value is -1 (invalid mapping).
